name: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response
description: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response Integration supports the investigative type of actions to allow Phantom users to fully automate the analysis of suspicious URLs. For example, IR teams responsible for abuse inbox management can extract links or domains out of suspicious emails and automatically analyze them with the SlashNext SEER™ threat detection cloud to get definitive, binary verdicts (malicious or benign) along with IOCs, screenshots, and more. Automating URL analysis can save IR teams hundreds of hours versus manually triaging these emails or checking URLs and domains against less accurate phishing databases and domain reputation services

api_key.description: Your API Key (The system uses this API key to authenticate with SlashNext Cloud. If you don’t have a valid API key, please reach us at support@slashnext.com)

api_base_url.description: SlashNext API Base URL (Input only if specifically provided by SlashNext)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity and authentication using supplied configuration
Find information about your API quota, like current usage, quota left, etc

render.title: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response - API Quota

actions.description: Search in SlashNext Cloud database and retrieve the reputation of a host

host.description: Host can either be a domain name or an IPv4 address

render.title: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response - Host Reputation

actions.description: Search in SlashNext Cloud database and retrieve a list of all URLs associated with the specified host

host.description: Host can either be a domain name or IPv4 address

limit.description: Maximum number of URL records to fetch. This is an optional parameter with a default value of 10

render.title: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response - Host URLs

actions.description: Search in SlashNext Cloud database and retrieve a detailed report for a host and associated URL

host.description: Host can either be a domain name or IPv4 address

render.title: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response - Host Report

actions.description: Perform a real-time URL reputation scan with SlashNext cloud-based SEER Engine
actions.verbose: Perform a real-time URL reputation scan with SlashNext cloud-based SEER Engine. If the specified URL already exists in the cloud database, scan results will get returned immediately. If not, this action will submit a URL scan request and return with a ‘check back later’ message along with a unique Scan ID. Users can check the results of this scan with ‘scan report’ action after 30 seconds or later using the returned Scan ID.

url.description: The URL that needs to be scanned

extended_info.description: If extented_info is checked, the system along with URL reputation also downloads forensics data like screenshot, HTML and rendered text

render.title: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response - URL Scan

actions.description: Perform a real-time URL scan with SlashNext cloud-based SEER Engine in a blocking mode
actions.verbose: Perform a real-time URL scan with SlashNext cloud-based SEER Engine in a blocking mode. If the specified URL already exists in the cloud database, the scan result will get returned immediately. If not, this action will submit a URL scan request and wait for the scan to finish. The scan may take up to 30 seconds to finish.

url.description: The URL that needs to be scanned

extended_info.description: If extented_info is checked, the system along with URL reputation also downloads forensics data like screenshot, HTML and rendered text

timeout.description: A timeout value in seconds. If the system is unable to complete a scan within the specified timeout, a timeout error will be returned. Users may try again with a different timeout. If no timeout value is specified, a default value of 60 seconds will be used

render.title: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response - URL Scan Sync

actions.description: Retrieve URL scan results against a previous Scan request
actions.verbose: Retrieve URL scan results against a previous Scan request. If the scan is finished, the result will be returned immediately; otherwise, a ‘check back later' message will be returned.

scanid.description: Scan ID returned by an earlier call to ‘url scan’ or ‘url scansync’ action

extended_info.description: If extented_info is checked, the system along with URL reputation also downloads forensics data like screenshot, HTML and rendered text

render.title: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response - URL Scan Report

actions.description: Download webpage screenshot against a previous URL Scan request

scanid.description: Scan ID returned by an earlier call to ‘url scan’ or ‘url scansync’ action

render.title: SlashNext Phishing Incident Response - Download Screenshot

scanid.description: Scan ID returned by an earlier call to ‘url scan’ or ‘url scansync’ action

scanid.description: Scan ID returned by an earlier call to ‘url scan’ or ‘url scansync’ action
